references.paper_title: Kitsune: An ensemble of autoencoders for online network intrusion detection
references.reason: This paper introduces Kitsune, an ensemble of autoencoders used as a baseline for evaluating DiffuPac's performance in online network intrusion detection.

references.paper_title: Toward generating a new intrusion detection dataset and intrusion traffic characterization
references.reason: This paper introduces the CICIDS-2017 dataset, which is one of the primary datasets used to train and evaluate the DiffuPac model.

references.paper_title: BERT: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces BERT, a crucial component of DiffuPac, which provides contextual understanding of network traffic patterns.

references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces diffusion probabilistic models, which form the foundation for the diffusion model utilized in DiffuPac.
This paper provides a crucial theoretical foundation for diffusion models, further enhancing the understanding and development of the generative aspect of DiffuPac.
